Production Co: Raygun Productions, George Hamilton Productions, Merv Griffin Entertainment
Synopsis: Tired of her bandleader husband's philandering ways, Ann Devereaux (Ren√©e Zellweger) packs her sons, Robbie and George (Logan Lerman), into their 1953 Cadillac and hits the road in search of a new man who can bankroll their future.
